input.sentences: we all fooled around while we were there .
when class began we went to class .
we learned a lot while we were there .
output.sentences: Early in the morning, all the children go to school.
When they showed up today, however, the teacher was not there.
She was running late, but when she got to school, the day resumed as usual.
The students learned so much that day.
When they got home they were able to play with their friends.
